'''0.0.19a_03'''<ref name="_03">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P7:49:51 <Notch> if you're running too fast, it SHOULD kick you. But the client really should throttle it better''" [...] "''P7:50:04 <Notch> I tried to fix it in _03, but I guess it didn't work''" (24:49 to 24:50 UTC)</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on June 20, 2009, at 00:09 UTC to fix bugs.<ref name="changelog">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P7:09:43 <Notch> fixed mirrong, fixed default stance, fixed rotation interpolation bugs''" (24:09:43 UTC)</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''4 bugs fixed'''
* Tried to fix a bug where the client incorrectly throttles players that get kicked for running too fast.<ref name="_03"/>
* Fixed mirroring.<ref name="changelog"/>
* Fixed the default player stance, but mobs still have glitched skins.<ref name="changelog"/>
* Fixed rotation interpolation bugs.<ref name="changelog"/>

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
[[file:2jedc86.png|thumb|A glitched mob in this version.<ref name="glitch">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P7:39:47 <Zuriki> http://i40.tinypic.com/2jedc86.png''" (24:39:47 UTC)</ref>]]
* [[Mob (entity)|Mobs]] have glitched skins.<ref name="glitch"/>

== Trivia ==
* This version has identical gameplay to 0.0.19a_04 due to that version's only change being a bug fix that did not work.
